title: SUPPORT MAIN LOOKING FOR CLASH SPOT
body: I mean the title really says it all. I'm a low ELO support main. I want to find a team for Clash. Add me in game. I am comfortable on a large pool of champions including; Morgana, Alistar, Soraka, Sona, Pyke, Thresh, Lulu, Rakan, Leona, Karma, Nautilus, Nami, Zyra, Taric and Zilean.
